description: Talk to Mosol Rei.

2.step: Use the wampum belt on Trufitus. (Chat 2-2-1-3-1)

description: Use the wampum belt on Trufitus.

3.step: Use your spade on the mound of earth.
3.subtitle: Ah Za Rhoon

description: Use your spade on the mound of earth.

4.step: Use a lit torch or candle on the fissure, then use your rope on the fissure. (Chat: 1)

description: Use a lit torch or candle on the fissure.
Use your rope on the fissure.

5.step: Search the fissure to climb down. (Chat: 1)

description: Search the fissure to climb down.

6.step: Use chisel on stone to get stone-plaque.

description: Use chisel on stone to get stone-plaque.
Search the cave-in.

8.step: Search the loose rocks to find a tattered scroll. Read the scroll. (Chat: 1)

description: Search the loose rocks to find a tattered scroll. Read the scroll.

9.step: Search the sacks to find a crumpled scroll. Read the scroll.

description: Search the sacks to find a crumpled scroll. Read the scroll.

10.step: Search the ancient gallows to get the Zadimus corpse. (Chat 2)

description: Search the ancient gallows to get the Zadimus corpse.

11.step: Bury the corpse by the Tribal statue in Tai-Bwo-Wannai.
11.subtitle: Proper Burial

description: Teleport or go back to the entrance and use the chisel on the table to leave the cave.
Bury the corpse by the Tribal statue in Tai-Bwo-Wannai.

12.step: Use the bone shard on Trufitus. (Chat 1-1-1)

description: Use the bone shard on Trufitus.

13.step: Search the well-stacked rocks on Cairn Isle. (Chat 1 )
13.subtitle: Tomb of Bervirius

description: Climb the rocks and cross the bridge to get to Cairn Isle.
Search the well-stacked rocks on Cairn Isle.
Search the dolmen.

15.step: Use a chisel on the sword pommel.

description: Use a chisel on the sword pommel.

16.step: Use bronze wire on the bone beads.

description: Use bronze wire on the bone beads.

17.step: Search the unique bright green palm tree from the north side to find two doors.
17.subtitle: Tomb of Rashiliyia

description: Teleport or climb up the rockslide to exit the cave.
Search the unique bright green palm tree from the north side to find two doors.
Attempt to open the door.

19.step: Use your chisel on the bone shard to make a bone key.

description: Use your chisel on the bone shard to make a bone key.

20.step: Equip the Beads of the dead then use the key on the doors.

description: Equip the Beads of the dead then use the key on the doors.

21.step: Use all 3 bones on the skeleton doors. (Note: DO NOT BURY THE BONES!.)

description: Open the Ancient metal gate.
Climb down the rocks.
Use all 3 bones on the skeleton doors.
Search the dolmen.
Defeat Nazastarool (Level 91) zombie form.
Defeat Nazastarool (Level 68) skeleton form.
Defeat Nazastarool (Level 93) ghost form.
Take Rashiliyia corpse.

25.step: Go down the well-stacked rocks on Cairn Isle. (Chat 1)
25.subtitle: Finishing up

description: Go down the well-stacked rocks on Cairn Isle.

26.step: Use the Rashiliyia corpse on the dolmen.

description: Use the Rashiliyia corpse on the dolmen.
